page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE
page.content: {..Family Life.. My dad,my brother & I always get up at 7a.m.and go out to do the feeding.My first job is to let Lassie the dog out then she starts singing!Then we have breakfast & bed the cattle down.We drive the tractor to work on log-splitting,rolling,spraying or spinning.It is nearly forage harvesting,at the end of the month.I like driving "Chug" round the yard. On Wednesday 8th.May the day the school goes swimming my brother & I got up very early and played a game called T & T.Then we had breakfast of cereal.Then we watched T.V. Hawk the Slayer was on. Then we waited in the car for Mum to drive us up the road to school.We went into the classroom and played another game of T&T.After a few minutes the bell rang.We went into class and later went swimming.
